Kirsten Gillibrand , a member of the Senate Armed Services Committee, said, We need a commitment by Secretaries Janet Napolitano and Robert Gates to work with local communities along the border to make sure they have the resources to solve this problem and keep communities across the state safe from drug-related violence.`` With the right leadership and priorities, I'm confident we can put the resources we need on the ground to keep New York communities safe and drug-free.
